transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: This call is now being recorded.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Yeah, good morning, Suneha baat kar rahi hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan sir kal aapka customer care pe call gaya tha sir.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Aapne call kiya tha kya problem aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Problem ye aa rahi hai ji main nahi karna chahta tabhi to na ji mere ko close karwa do system main kam ummid nahi hai raha main.
Executive: Kya matlab kya problem aa gaya aap mujhe proper bataiye fir main us hisab se aapko batati hu.
Customer: Nahi kuch kuch isme wo nahi aa raha response nahi mil raha.
Executive: Response nahi mil raha hai? Leads aap sahi se use kar rahe ho kya matlab kya samne se reply aa raha hai buyers ka?
Customer: Koi kuch aata koi kuch matlab apne usme nahi aa raha kuch bhi.
Executive: Usme kuch nahi aa raha hai?
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Matlab aapko cheeze nahi samajh mein aa rahi hai sir ya business ke regarding kuch samajh mein nahi aa raha isme?
Customer: Business to aa gaya usme customer nahi hai ye hamare uske aas pass ke matlab door se aate hai wo bolte hai itne door nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Matlab aapko ye hai ki aapko jo clients hai wo buyer hai wo aapko aapke nearby location pe chahiye na?
Customer: Haan wo door se hai wo bolte hai kabhi door pad jaye kabhi aise matlab.
Executive: Haan wo to kyuki aapka aapka product bhi aisa hai na sir? Ya to bulk mein hota aisa kuch hota to baat alag hoti lekin aapka product hi bhari hai aapko transportation charges hi itne badh jayenge.
Customer: Haan to to bhi main kar raha hu close karwa do jo paisa hai mera jitne din mein aayega wo dalwa do koi dikkat nahi.
Executive: Haan main samajh rahi hu sir. Ek mahina ek bar dekh lo sir try karke kyuki abhi to aapne start hi kara hai to starting mein to hota hi hai problem.
Customer: Nahi maine dekh liya kuch wo hota tabhi karta.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Nahi mere bas ki baat nahi hai.
Executive: Sir online business hai thoda to time lagega hi cheezo ko samajhne ke liye aur us karne ke liye. Ek bar main aapke liye competitors bhi check kar leti hu to aapke competitors yaha pe hai to wo log kaise kar rahe hai ya wo log kitne saal se hai? Jaise ye Jaswant hum dumper body repair karke ek hai. Hai na Hisar ke. Ye bhi kar rahe hai aath saal se hai ye to.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Jangra motors Black bull fabrication One truck body Jind ke hai ye hai na? Aur ye Krishan body center karke hai Jhajjar ke hai ye. To ye log to bahut time se.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Kabhi to matlab kisi customer se baat karte hai wo bolta hai bahut door pad jayega. To matlab nahi ho paya theek hai bhai.
Executive: To door pad jayega na to aapko leads jo hai wo Haryana, Delhi aur aapke aas pass aap koi aur location batao waha ki leads provide karte hai. Haan to Haryana ke Narnaul kitna door hai aapke yaha se?
Customer: Narnaul. Narnaul Narnaul karke jagah. Narnaul Narnaul. Haan. Haan haan Narnaul. Narnaul bhi kafi pad ja hai mano kareeb 100 kilometer pad ja.
Executive: Sonipat?
Customer: 100 100.
Executive: Sonipat. Bhiwani mein rehte ho na aap sir?
Customer: Haan Bhiwani. To aap kitne kilometer ke under mein aap wo services dekhna chahte ho? Ki kar sakte ho aap kitne kilometer mein minimum?
Customer: Dekho mere ko to koi dikkat hi nahi koi itni door se bhi aa jaye customer mere ko to kya karna kam karna hai mere ko to. Bilkul bilkul. Wo to matlab customer ki demand hai na. Aap offline mein sir offline mein kaise karte ho offline mein pure all India karte ho sir?
Executive: Offline mein Rajasthan se matlab dusri state se bhi aata hai Rajasthan se bhi aata hai. Aur Haryana ke to aate hi aate hai. Okay okay. Matlab nearby nearby kam idea mano aap 50 100 100 kilometer tak customer offline aata hai mera matlab phone pe aise contact se.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Samajh gayi sir ji main aapka. Ki jaise maan lo abhi dekho aapne start hi kara hai kitna din hua hai abhi aapko hafta hua hoga do hafta. 11 November se shuru hua hai na to 26 tarikh hui hai do hafte hue hai abhi hai na? Do hafte hue hai abhi aap jab buylead use kar rahe ho sir. Dheere dheere aapko direct inquiry calls bhi aana chalu ho jayengi. Hai na? Inquiry calls kya hota hai ki samne se aapka catalog dekh ke clients aapko buyer aapko reach kar raha hai. Hai na call kar raha hai aapko ya inquiry kar raha hai aapke product ke liye. To wo bhi hone lag jayega ek hi tarika nahi hai IndiaMART se business generate karne ka. To thoda agar aap aur jaise aap abhi use kar rahe hai aur abhi aapko aisa bhi lag raha hai na pehle starting mein kaisa lag raha tha ki sab log phone utha ke bol dete the ki nahi hame to jarurat hi nahi hai ki hum to aise hi dekh rahe the. Hai na aisa bol rahe hai na aapko log? Haan to abhi kya hua ek bande ne bola ki mere ko door jyada pad raha hai iska matlab us bande ne requirement dali thi aur usko pata hai lekin door padne ki wajah se wo nahi kar raha hai. Kabhi aapko ek person aisa bhi milega sir jo aapko deal karega aap se deal karega hai na? To dheere dheere karke jaise jaise aap step by step aage badhoge aapki profile pe abhi do mahine tak aapki profile pe starting mein kam hota hai ek dam se business to nahi aa jata hai sir ye aapko bhi pata hoga offline business bhi kara hoga sir mahine bhar mein response acha nahi mila hoga pura saal laga hoga kitne saal se kar rahe hai aap?
Customer: Haan to 9 saal se kar raha hu.
Executive: 9 saal se kar rahe hai na sir 9 saal se aap business kar rahe hai 9 saal mein kya pehle jab pehla saal tha aapka jab aapne business shuru hi kara tha to mushkile aayi hongi na starting mein aapke pass? Aisa to nahi tha aapne business band kar diya tha. Hai na to thoda time lagta hai aisa nahi hai ki online business pe aap aaye ek aapko hua kuch time aur aapko ek dam se business pe business aane lage competition aapko pata hi hai wo online mein bahut hai offline bhi bahut hai. Theek hai to agar online rehna hai sir to jaise aap abhi shuru kara hai na aapne to usi consistency ke sath shuru karo baki account manager main hu aapki aap mujhse connect kara karo koi bhi cheez hota hai. Aap aapko lagta hai ki leads ka kuch problem aa raha hai to main aapko share karungi cheeze hai na? Main aapko leads ke bare mein bata dungi baki abhi dheere dheere karke na aapko inquiry calls bhi badhengi. Hai na sir?
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Right. Theek hai thoda patience rakho sir hoga aise nahi hai ki nahi hoga hai na? Dheere dheere karke thoda time de do isko matlab jaise abhi aaj kitna time hua hai 26 tarikh ko hai na sir abhi thoda is mahine to dekh lo na karke isko ye. Ye bhi karke dekh lo sir agar aur bhi koi problem aa rahi hai baki aapko jab call aur inquiry aana chalu ho jayega na to aapko bhi lagega ki ho sakta hai ye theek yaha pe. Hmm. Hai na? Baki jaise leads abhi aapko front se main dikha rahi hu yaha pe close body container truck service aaya Delhi ka hai ye. Kya? Inko pick up city ek second haan ye Delhi ka lead hai sir. Close body container truck. Hai na? Ek hai. Ye 22 feet iron truck container ye banate ho na sir aap? Kitna bata? 22 feet iron truck container. Iron matlab? Loha loha. Haan container diye isko. Haan haan container chahiye. Gurgaon ka hai ye. Ek second Gurgaon. 22 feet iron truck container hai Gurgaon ke hai ye. Hai na ye member bhi hamare paanch saal se purane hai GST verified leads bhi hai sir. Hai na aap isko use kar sakte ho main aapko bhej deti hu whatsapp pe bhi hai na? Koi nahi. Haan sir thoda dekho isko cheezo ko baki aapko call aur inquiry apne aap hi aana chalu ho jayengi hai na aapka abhi catalog bhi ache se updated hai bas thoda aur bhi kam us pe karenge to aur achi leads aapko aayengi sir. Theek hai sir?
Theek hai sir theek hai thank you thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to close the system, not hopeful.

- Not getting proper responses from buyers.

- Clients are too far from his location.



Resolution:

- Executive checked for competitors in the area.

- Suggested focusing on nearby locations for leads.

- Explained the importance of patience in online business.

- Offered to share leads and provide support.

- Sent a lead on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will wait and see for a month.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, location, competitors
